languages.text: "С Деменцем, впавшим в ересь, ты расправил{mf|ся|ась} сам{mf||а}. Аксиоманта... просто исчезла, пока внезапно не обнаружилась погибшей на Ефрате-II. Не понимаю, как ей удавалось скрываться от меня..."
"You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."
languages.original_text: "С Деменцем, впавшим в ересь, ты расправил{mf|ся|ась} сам{mf||а}. Аксиоманта... просто исчезла, пока внезапно не обнаружилась погибшей на Ефрате-II. Не понимаю, как ей удавалось скрываться от меня..."

traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「あなたが始末したデメンツは異端に堕ちた。アクシオマンサは…ユーフラテス・IIで突然死ぬまで行方が知れなかった。どうやって私から身を隠し続けていたのかはわからないが…」
languages.original_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが始末したデメンツは異端に堕ちた。アクシオマンサは…ユーフラテス・IIで突然死ぬまで行方が知れなかった。どうやって私から身を隠し続けていたのかはわからないが…」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “堕入异端的德曼兹死在了你的手里。至于阿修曼塔……她失去了踪迹，之后突然死在了欧夫拉茨二号星。我不知道她是怎么躲过了我的追踪……”
languages.original_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."

traits.locale_text: “堕入异端的德曼兹死在了你的手里。至于阿修曼塔……她失去了踪迹，之后突然死在了欧夫拉茨二号星。我不知道她是怎么躲过了我的追踪……”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Vous avez anéanti Dementz, qui avait sombré dans l'hérésie. Axiomantha... a tout simplement disparu avant d'être retrouvée morte sur Euphrate-II. J'ignore comment elle a réussi à se cacher de moi... »
languages.original_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez anéanti Dementz, qui avait sombré dans l'hérésie. Axiomantha... a tout simplement disparu avant d'être retrouvée morte sur Euphrate-II. J'ignore comment elle a réussi à se cacher de moi... »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Tú enviaste a Dementz, quien había adoptado creencias heréticas. Axiomantha... desapareció sin más hasta que encontraron su cuerpo sin vida en Eufrates II. No sé cómo logró esconderse de mí...».
languages.original_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."

traits.locale_text: «Tú enviaste a Dementz, quien había adoptado creencias heréticas. Axiomantha... desapareció sin más hasta que encontraron su cuerpo sin vida en Eufrates II. No sé cómo logró esconderse de mí...».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Ihr habt Dementz getötet, der zum Ketzer geworden war. Axiomantha ... ist einfach verschwunden, bis sie auf Eufrates II plötzlich tot aufgetaucht ist. Ich weiß nicht, wie es ihr gelungen ist, sich vor mir zu verstecken ..."
languages.original_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Dementz getötet, der zum Ketzer geworden war. Axiomantha ... ist einfach verschwunden, bis sie auf Eufrates II plötzlich tot aufgetaucht ist. Ich weiß nicht, wie es ihr gelungen ist, sich vor mir zu verstecken ..."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Kâfirliğe boyun eğen Dementz'i siz idam ettiniz. Axiomantha ise durduk yere ortadan kayboldu, sonra bir anda Eufrates II'de ölü bulundu. Benden saklanmayı nasıl başardığı konusunda hiçbir fikrim yok."
languages.original_text: "You dispatched Dementz, who had lapsed into heresy. Axiomantha... simply disappeared until she suddenly turned up dead on Eufrates II. I have no idea how she managed to hide from me..."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirliğe boyun eğen Dementz'i siz idam ettiniz. Axiomantha ise durduk yere ortadan kayboldu ve sonra bir anda Eufrates II'de ölü bulundu. Benden saklanmayı nasıl başardığı konusunda hiçbir fikrim yok."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
